references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces the nuScenes dataset, which is the primary dataset used for the experiments in the paper, making it a crucial foundational reference.
This paper is a closely related work using multi-modal data for unsupervised 3D object discovery, providing a significant comparison point for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces the DINO self-supervised learning method, which is used for visual appearance encoding in the proposed method, serving as a key component.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces the Vision Transformer architecture used to process camera images for visual appearance encoding, a core part of the proposed framework.
This paper introduces the CenterPoint 3D object detector, which is the baseline detector used and improved upon in the experiments, making it a fundamental reference for comparison.
